Package com.github.games647.craftapi.resolver

Class MojangResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.games647.craftapi.resolver.AbstractResolver
      • com.github.games647.craftapi.resolver.MojangResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthResolver, ProfileResolver

    public class MojangResolver
extends AbstractResolver
implements AuthResolver, ProfileResolver
    Resolver that contacts Mojang.

        public Optional<Verification> hasJoined​(String username,
                                        String serverHash,
                                        InetAddress hostIp)
                                 throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: AuthResolver
        Verifies if a player requesting to join a online mode server is actually authenticated against Mojang.
        Specified by:
        hasJoined in interface AuthResolver
        Parameters:
        username - the joining username
        serverHash - server id hash
        hostIp - the player connecting IP address
        Returns:
        the verification response or empty if invalid
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server

      • changeSkin

        public void changeSkin​(Account account,
                       String toUrl,
                       boolean slimModel)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: AuthResolver
        Changes the skin to the image that can be download from that URL. The URL have to be direct link without things like HTML in it.
        Specified by:
        changeSkin in interface AuthResolver
        Parameters:
        account - authenticated account
        toUrl - the URL that Mojang should use for downloading the skin from
        slimModel - true if slim model or false for steve
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server

      • findProfiles

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Profile> findProfiles​(String... names)
                                                             throws IOException,
                                                                    RateLimitException
        Description copied from interface: ProfileResolver
        Find all profiles for a given list of names.
        Specified by:
        findProfiles in interface ProfileResolver
        Parameters:
        names - case-insensitive player names (only 100 per request call are allowed)
        Returns:
        immutable set of all profiles that are premium
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error on fetching the profile
        RateLimitException - more than 600 name to UUID requests within 10 minutes (if using proxies including for the chosen proxy)

      • findNames

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<NameHistory> findNames​(UUID uuid)
                                                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ProfileResolver
        Fetches the name history of that player
        Specified by:
        findNames in interface ProfileResolver
        Parameters:
        uuid - premium UUID
        Returns:
        immutable list of the name history or empty if it isn't a premium player
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error on fetching the name history

      • findProfile

        public Optional<Profile> findProfile​(String name)
                              throws IOException,
                                     RateLimitException
        Description copied from interface: ProfileResolver
        Find one profile for the given name
        Specified by:
        findProfile in interface ProfileResolver
        Parameters:
        name - case-insensitive player name
        Returns:
        profile or empty if not premium
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error on fetching the profile
        RateLimitException - more than 600 name to UUID requests within 10 minutes (if using proxies including for the chosen proxy)

      • findProfile

        public Optional<Profile> findProfile​(String name,
                                     Instant time)
                              throws IOException,
                                     RateLimitException
        Description copied from interface: ProfileResolver
        Fetch game profile that had the given name at a specific time. It only works if the player changed the name at least once.
        Specified by:
        findProfile in interface ProfileResolver
        Parameters:
        name - case-insensitive name
        time - timestamp the player had this name or Instant.ofEpochMilli(long) with 0 for the current name
        Returns:
        the profile or empty if the player didn't changed the name or isn't premium
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error on fetching the skin
        RateLimitException - more than 600 name to UUID requests within 10 minutes (if using proxies including for the chosen proxy)

      • downloadSkin

        public Optional<SkinProperty> downloadSkin​(UUID uuid)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           RateLimitException
        Description copied from interface: ProfileResolver
        Fetches skin.
        Specified by:
        downloadSkin in interface ProfileResolver
        Parameters:
        uuid - premium UUID
        Returns:
        skin or empty if it's not a UUID of a premium player
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error on fetching the skin
        RateLimitException - more than 1 request within one minute for the same uuid

      • getMaxNameRequests

        public int getMaxNameRequests​()
        Returns:
        maximum amount of name to UUID requests that will be established to Mojang directly without proxies. (Between 0 and 600 within 10 minutes). Default is 600.

      • getProxySelector

        public ProxySelector getProxySelector​()
        Returns:
        the current proxy selector or ProxySelector.getDefault() if none

      • setProxySelector

        public void setProxySelector​(ProxySelector proxySelector)
        Parameters:
        proxySelector - proxy selector that should be used

      • setMaxNameRequests

        public void setMaxNameRequests​(int maxNameRequests)
        Parameters:
        maxNameRequests - maximum amount of name to UUID requests that will be established to Mojang directly without proxies. (Between 0 and 600 within 10 minutes)
